[✨PERFECT CHOICE FOR YOUR SKINCARE REGIMEN✨] Enhances the absorption of serums, ampoules and moisturizers as the first step of your skincare routine, perfectlly prepping your skin before make-up to achieve glowy glass skin look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Absolute Game-Changer: The Ultimate Face Toner
reviews.reviewText: I recently discovered a face toner that has completely transformed my skincare routine, and I couldn't be more thrilled to share my experience with you all. The [Brand Name] Face Toner has become an absolute staple in my beauty regimen, leaving me with a radiant and refreshed complexion that I never thought possible.From the moment I applied this toner, I was captivated by its luxurious texture and invigorating scent. The formula is incredibly lightweight, making it a joy to apply and ensuring that my skin doesn't feel weighed down or sticky. The refreshing aroma is like a burst of vitality, instantly awakening my senses and setting the tone for a rejuvenating experience.One of the standout features of this face toner is its exceptional ability to balance and restore my skin's natural pH levels. After just a few weeks of consistent use, I noticed a significant improvement in the overall texture and tone of my complexion. The toner effectively tightens pores and reduces their appearance, giving my skin a smooth and refined look.Another remarkable benefit of this face toner is its outstanding hydrating properties. It effortlessly quenches my skin's thirst, providing a surge of moisture that lasts throughout the day. This has been a game-changer for me, as my skin has always been prone to dryness. With this toner, I no longer have to worry about tight or flaky skin, as it keeps my face supple and plump.What truly sets this face toner apart from others on the market is its impressive array of natural ingredients. It contains a blend of soothing botanical extracts, such as chamomile and aloe vera, which work harmoniously to calm any redness or irritation. Furthermore, the toner is free from harsh chemicals, parabens, and sulfates, making it suitable for even the most sensitive skin types.I also appreciate the versatility of this toner. It can be used both morning and night, either as a quick refresher or as an essential step in my skincare routine. I often use it as a makeup setting spray, as it helps my foundation and concealer blend seamlessly, giving my skin an airbrushed finish.In conclusion, the [Brand Name] Face Toner has been a true revelation for my skincare routine. With its exquisite formula, hydrating properties, and natural ingredients, it has become an indispensable part of my daily regimen. If you're looking to elevate your skincare game and achieve a glowing complexion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars no scent, non-irritation
reviews.reviewText: With all the skin care out there, this one is a nice simple toner for everyday. It feels nice on the skin (both mature and teen skin) and has not caused any problems. I would definitely buy again and is a great product for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Immediately got their other products
reviews.reviewText: Skincare Hack:My personal hack involves adding this toner to a mini plant mister for a refreshing mist directly onto my face. This not only creates a spa-like atmosphere at home but also ensures that I save a significant amount of product compared to using a cotton pad. The misting technique enhances absorption and leaves my skin feeling revitalized.Facialist Approved:The noticeable improvement in my pores caught the attention of my facialist, who inquired about my skincare secret. I gladly shared my love for the Soothing Heartleaf Extract Toner, emphasizing its role in achieving a clear and even skin tone.Recommendation:For those seeking a toner that goes beyond the ordinary, I highly recommend the Soothing Heartleaf Extract Toner. Its natural ingredients and versatile application make it a perfect choice for enhancing the absorption of serums and achieving that coveted glowy glass skin look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars it's ok i guess
reviews.reviewText: i don't hate this toner but i'm not sure it did a lot for my skin maybe if i keep using it more i'll notice something and i hope i remember to update here.i do like the watery texture so good and light for hotter days and also perfect for layering toners.it has no scent and zero irritating ingredients (unless you're allergic to heartleaf), didn't irritate my skin whatsoever and i have rosacea and acne prone skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this toner!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used toners before they several that I’ve used just irritate my skin and this is the first that hasn’t bothered me one bit. It’s so light and pleasant. I will absolutely be buying this again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I found this toner to be really soothing and easy on the skin. It has a water-like texture but still feels very moisturizing. I notice that after using it on red areas/inflamed areas on my skin where I break out, the redness goes down and soothes the skin. I think this would be best for people with sensitive skin or oily skin, but overall I think its good for anyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I never thought a product would show instant results. I used it for the first time and instantly saw results. Nose pores were gone and no longer dark. I even used on my underarms and all the dark spots are gone. Cleaned out! Waiting to see the long term results of my pores being smaller and I’m so excited. A must get for your skin care routine along with the cleanser and foam cleaner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it
reviews.reviewText: I like this toner. I've never used a toner before and was doing my research for days. I saw this on tik tok and decided to purchase it and it was worth it.

This is a great product as a step 3 in the face care routine ( after double cleansing) it is soothing and has literally calmed any redness on my skin. It is light and not sticky. Beautiful base for serums and creams. Absolutely recommend it!!
È un tonico rinfrescante, lascia la pelle morbida e liscia. Per la mia pelle grassa è l ideale. Consigliato.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried quite a few toners and this one is insanely good. This worked so well with my skin I will 100% repurchase!

reviews.reviewTitle: Worth the hype - a must have for sensitive skin!
reviews.reviewText: It has been a month since I started using this product for my sensitive skin and I'm in love!The formula of this toner is so gentle, refreshing and lightweight.I use it twice a day and within shortest time I already noticed an improvement in my skin looking more moisturized and a reduction of my redness on my cheeks. It's so soothing and hydrating, a definite must have in everyone's routine! :)
Enfin un tonique qui nasseche pas ma peau ou me crée des irritations. J'ai tour de suite senti la différence, et je l'ai vu 1 semaine après.Aucun doute que je resterai sur cette gamme!
